meanings.definition: Contorted or bent out of shape
meanings.sent1: The tree had a twisted trunk, making it look like a spiral.
meanings.sent2: She twisted her ankle while running in the park.
meanings.sent3: The twisted balloon animals made the children laugh.
meanings.sent4: His twisted sense of humor always kept his friends entertained.
meanings.sent5: The twisted branches of the old tree created a spooky atmosphere in the forest.

meanings.definition: Turned or rotated in a spiral or circular direction
meanings.sent1: The twisted staircase led up to the tower.
meanings.sent2: She twisted the lid off the jar to open it.
meanings.sent3: The twisted ribbon on the gift added a nice touch.
meanings.sent4: The twisted road through the mountains offered breathtaking views.
meanings.sent5: The twisted pattern on the rug gave the room a unique look.

meanings.definition: Distorted or warped in meaning or interpretation
meanings.sent1: His twisted logic made it hard to follow his argument.
meanings.sent2: The news article twisted the facts to fit their agenda.
meanings.sent3: The twisted plot of the movie kept the audience guessing.
meanings.sent4: Her twisted version of events confused everyone in the room.
meanings.sent5: The twisted truth finally came to light after years of deception.
